description: Model registry for deer detection models. Tracks all trained models, their performance, and deployment status.

models.name: YOLOv8n - Legacy Production Model
models.dataset_notes: Trained on historical dataset, exact composition unknown. Estimated ~1 year of manually annotated data across multiple seasons.

metrics.notes: Metrics to be benchmarked on v1.0_baseline dataset

models.notes: Original baseline model. Being replaced by YOLO26 with OpenVINO INT8 optimization.

dataset_versions.name: v1.0_2026-01-baseline
dataset_versions.description: Initial baseline dataset with manually annotated video frames

next_steps: 1. Benchmark YOLOv8n baseline on v1.0 dataset: yolo val model=models/production/best.pt data=data/training_datasets/v1.0_2026-01-baseline/data.yaml
2. Train YOLO26n on v1.0 dataset: yolo detect train data=data/training_datasets/v1.0_2026-01-baseline/data.yaml model=yolo26n.pt epochs=100
3. Export YOLO26n to OpenVINO INT8: model.export(format='openvino', int8=True)
4. Benchmark YOLO26 OpenVINO INT8 vs YOLOv8 PyTorch
5. Deploy YOLO26 INT8 to production after validation
